en.main:
Images you can use in descriptions
<arc/> <void/> <solar/>
<primary/> <special/> <heavy/>
<warlock/> <hunter/> <titan/>
Text coloring
<blue text /> <green text /> <purple text /> <yellow text />
<pvp text /> <pve text />

The same can be done to lines of text <green/>

You probably noticed having multiple spaces in the editor
              doesn't mean it will be the same in description
              you can change that with <breakSpaces/>

// This is comment content after // will not appear in the description

// ----------------------------------------------------------
// weapon type explanation
// they work like if else in programming

// if auto rifle
< weapon type ( AR ) >
    Apply this text
// else if glaive
< ( Glaive ) >
    Apply this text
// else
< ( other ) >
    Apply this text to all weapons not specified in this block
<$$>
// also, you can preview how it would look on x weapon by selecting the weapon in the weapon popup under the weapons name
// ----------------------------------------------------------
If there is something you want just ask
This is not everything you can do btw

To see the full list press CTRL + SPACE
Also, CTRL + F is a thing and can be used to find and replace
Also also editor has other stuff to see them press F1

// This variale only shows up on enhanced perks. DO NOT CHANGE IT
var e = 🡅

// vvv User-defined variables vvv
var CombatantScaling = https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling

var CombatantClassifications = https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants

var DamageBuffs = https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs

var GlobalTangleCooldown = Shares the 12 second global <strand/>Tangle creation cooldown.

var Reload = Counts as a manual reload and will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

수류탄 적중 시 혼돈의 교환을 제공하고 <pve 2000% /> <pvp [1000%] /> 만큼의 수류탄 피해를 증가시키며 수류탄 재생 속도를 1.75초 만큼 줄입니다.

如果敌人被蓄力漩涡手雷的初始爆炸和最后几次伤害命中，则可以触发两次混沌交易。

en.main: Well-rounded, reliable, fires a 3-round burst.

Weapon Kills grant Stacks of Sword Logic.

The number of Stacks and the buff duration are tied to the highest <link Enemy Rank [#CombatantClassifications] /> killed since activation:
• Minors: 1 Stack for 5.5 seconds
• Elites, Players: 2 Stacks for 7.5 seconds
• Minibosses and Players in their Super: 3 Stacks for 10.5 seconds
• Bosses: 4 Stacks for 15.5 seconds

Damage increase at 1|2|3|4 Stacks:
15% | <pve 25% /> <pvp [20%] /> | 35% | 50%

Additional Kills refresh the buff duration to the duration tied to the highest Enemy Rank killed.

Remains active while stowed.

enhanced (
#e Buff Duration is increased.
)

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.

en.main: Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Passively grants the <overload/>Overload Shot buff to Rocket Launchers without an intrinsic Breaker Type and increases their damage against <overload/>Overload Champions by 80%.

Rocket Launchers without an intrinsic Breaker Type are always Overcharged in activities with the Overcharged Weapons modifier.

import overload from global

Breaking a PVE Combatant's Shield with a <stasis/>Stasis or <strand/>Strand Weapon has a chance to <stasis/>Freeze (if <stasis/>Stasis Weapon) or <strand/>Suspend (if <strand/>Strand Weapon) them.

Wearing seasonal armor improves the chances of the perk triggering.
Killing a Frozen PVE Combatant spawns a <stasis/>Stasis Crystal close to the target's location. Bosses spawn 2 <stasis/>Crystals.
Dealing <solar/>Solar Ability Damage to Bosses and Champions <void/>Weakens them for 6 seconds.
Picking up an Orb of Power grants <strand/>Unraveling Rounds for <pve 7 /> <pvp [5] /> seconds.

'Multi-Dodge Ready' appears on the Buff List while within 15 meters of an enemy.

Dodging while Multi-Dodge is ready allows you to chain dodges infinitely for 6 seconds. Kills extend the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 11 seconds.

Multi-Dodge Dodges don't activate:
• <stasis/>Winter's Shroud and <strand/>Threaded Specter Aspects
• Dynamo, Bomber, Outreach, and Distribution Armor Mods

<strand/>Ensnaring Slam removes the buff after one usage.

Finishing a reload overfills the Magazine from reserves by 10% of the Base Magazine Capacity (rounded up) for each ally within 15 meters.

Overfill amount maxes out at 50%.

Upon scoring a set percentage of the Magazine Capacity as hits within ? seconds of each:
Fires a Tracking Rocket that matches Weapon's Elemental Damage Type.

Rockets deal <pve 22.4 /> <pvp [14] /> impact and <pve 24 /> <pvp [15] /> explosive damage on hit and inherit the weapon's <link Combatant Damage Scaling [#CombatantScaling] />. On non-primary weapons, the rockets receive and additional damage increase.

% of Magazine Capacity as hits required and the Additional Damage Increase by weapon archetype:
• Hand Cannons, Pulse Rifles, Submachine Guns: 45% Magazine Capacity \\ 0% increased damage (Baseline)
• Sniper Rifles: 50%? \\ 100%
• Grenade Launchers: 30% \\ 25%
• Machine Guns: 25% \\ 50%
• Fusion Rifles, Shotguns: ?% \\ 150%

Further hits do not provide activation progress for 1 second after activation.

en.main: import main from 1870851715

Scoring 2 to 3 <stasis/>Stasis Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of <stasis/>Stasis Weapon Surge for <pve 11 /> <pvp [6] /> seconds. Further <stasis/>Stasis Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard with a cooldown matching Towering Barricade's.

On Glacial Guard Cast:
• Grants Shielded buff for 20 seconds
• Grants the maximum 4 Stack of Weapon Surge
• Applies 40 <stasis/>Slow Stacks to PvE Combatants within 7 meters

Shielded:
• Grants a 100 HP Overshield <pve that provides 62.5% Damage Resistance in PVE /> (breaking this overshield removes the buff)
• Prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding
• Cannot regain Class Ability Energy while active
• Taking damage refreshes the buff duration 
• Class Ability activation removes the buff

방벽을 빙하의 방비로 변환합니다.

빙하의 방비 시전 시:
7미터 이내에 있는 적들에게 감속 스택 40개를 부여합니다.

보호막은 20초 동안 지속되며 100HP의 체력을 가지고 있습니다. <pve 62.5% 피해 감소를 부여합니다. /> 
보호막의 지속 시간은 피해를 입으면 초기화되며 질주, 직업 점프, 그리고 슬라이딩을 봉인합니다.

보호막이 지속되는 동안 직업 능력 에너지는 재생되지 않습니다.
빙하의 방비가 활성화 된 상태에서 방벽을 사용하면 효과가 해제됩니다.

en.main:
Kills have a chance to release a varying number of Submunitions on top of where the enemy died.
6? second cooldown after activation.

The number of Submunitions spawned is tied to <link Enemy Rank [#CombatantClassifications] />:
• Minors: 1 Submunition
• Elites, Players: 3 Submunitions
• Minibosses, Bosses: 7 Submunitions

Submunitions:
• Identical to Telesto Bolts in behavior, exploding on proximity or contact and last up to 10.5 seconds after attaching to a surface.
• Deal up to <pve 39.5? /> <pvp [?] /> damage and inherit the weapon's <link Combatant Damage Scaling [#CombatantScaling] />.
<solar/>Ignitions have a 20?% increased blast radius.

Increases the number of <solar/>Scorch Stacks you apply to targets by 50% in most cases.

Always rounds up: 3 🠚 4.5 🠚 5

Specific increases from <solar/>Ember of Ashes for <solar/>Scorch sources can be found in their descriptions.

Killing 2 enemies within ? seconds of each with <solar/>Ignitions creates an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Killing <solar/>Scorched enemies spawns a <solar/>Firesprite and grants Melee Ability Energy based on <link Enemy Rank [#CombatantClassifications] />:
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 8%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 15%   
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 17.5%  
• Players: 20%  
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

ko.main:
근접 공격을 적중 시 분노 도체 스택을 쌓게 됩니다.
근접 공격을 받으면 5미터 주위에 <arc/>전기 폭발을 일으킵니다.  
<arc/>전기 폭발은 분노 도체 스택 하나 마다 근접 공격 위력의 22% 식 오릅니다.

분노 도체는 스택에 따라 33-50-70%의 근접 피해 감소를 제공합니다.

근접 공격 피해를 입거나 10초 이상 근접 공격을 적중하지 못하면 모든 스택이 사라집니다.

물리 속성이나 장착한 하위 속성과 일치하는 속성의 핸드 캐논을 준비할 시:

수호자에겐 적용되지 않습니다.

en.main:
Dealing Ability Damage to a <link Major, Boss, or Player [#CombatantClassifications] /> target grants 4 Stacks of Subclass-Matching Weapon Surge and highlights the target for 10 seconds each. Weapon Surge duration is not refreshable.

Killing highlighted targets spawns a Subclass-Matching Elemental Pickup.

Elemental Pickups include <solar/>Firesprites, <arc/>Ionic Traces, <stasis/>Stasis Shards, <strand/>Strand Tangles, and <void/>Void Breaches.

ko.main:
상시 공중 효율을 20만큼 증가시킵니다.

1초 동안 적 근처에 조준을 하면 5초간 표식을 남깁니다.
표식은 벽을 통해서 볼 수 있습니다.

적의 체력이 30% 이하 일 때:
30%로 부터 남은 체력의 %당 1%의 추가 피해를 받습니다.
(예: 체력 10% -> 20% 피해 증가)

피해 증가는 능력과 무기에 모두 적용됩니다.

zh-chs.main:

标记穿墙可见。

如果敌人血量低于 30%：
提供低于 30% 对应百分数的伤害提高。
（例如：剩 10% 的血量 -> 伤害增加 20%）

伤害提高适用于所有造成的伤害。

en.main:
Modifies <solar/>Golden Gun to only fire a single shot that deals 650% increased damage. (~72.1% more damage compared to 3 Precision Hits with Marksman Golden Gun. Also, please only use it with Marksman Golden Gun)

Scoring a <solar/>Golden Gun Kill refunds 33% Super Energy and causes the enemy to explode, dealing up to <pve 400 /> <pvp [?] /> damage in a ? meter radius.

Precision Kills grant 1.5-4.5% Super Energy depending on <link Enemy Rank [#CombatantClassifications] />.

Increases Melee Damage by 100% for 1.22 seconds after hitting a target with #d Shotgun Pellets in the spread.

Against <link Bosses and Vehicles [#CombatantClassifications] />, this is increased to 150% for the following melee options:
All Unpowered Melees, <arc/>Combination Blow, <arc/>Disorienting Blow, <arc/>Chain Lightning, and <strand/>Grapple Melee

The following options do not benefit from the perk:
• <hunter/>Hunters: <solar/>Proximity Explosive Knife's and <void/>Snare Bomb's detonations, <arc/>Tempest Strike, <stasis/>Withering Blade, <strand/>Threaded Spike
• <titan/>Titans: <solar/>Throwing Hammer, <solar/>Consecration, <arc/>Thunderclap, <void/>Shield Throw, <strand/>Flechette Storm
• <warlock/>Warlocks: all abilities except <arc/>Chain Lightning 

The buff does not stack with the passive Melee Damage Increase against <stasis/>Frozen non-Boss targets. The <link higher buff of the two [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1N_zEcw3-pGL2jGUCGaAHjoKEr_VIbDc7-UWel-DGmys/] /> takes precedence.

This means that with the exception of <stasis/>Shiver Strike and <stasis/>Howl of the Storm in PVE where the perk's buff is always higher, it will only provide a benefit over <stasis/>Freeze's buff when used against Bosses and Vehicles.

var d = all 12

#e Requires 2 fewer Shotgun Pellets to activate.
)

en.main:
Upon scoring multiple hits within 6 seconds of each:
• <title Refills [G_refill] /> 10% of the Magazine (rounded up) from thin air. Can be reactivated without a cooldown. Cannot load the Magazine beyond its base capacity.
• Grants 40% increased damage against <link Constructs and Vehicles [#CombatantClassifications] /> for #e${5+#d} seconds. Additional hits refresh the buff duration.

Number of Hits Required: 
• If Magazine Size is 1: 3 Hits
• Otherwise: 2 + 50% (25% on <primary/>Primary Weapons) of Base Magazine Capacity rounded down

Hits against Constructs and Vehicles provide 1.5x activation progress for <primary/>Primary weapons and 2x progress for <special/>Special weapons.

Pellet Shotguns, Rocket-Assisted Sidearms, and non-Wave Frame Grenade Launchers can trigger the perk twice on initial activations (when the buff isn't active). Note: please don't ask about the specifics of this.

Wave Frame Grenade Launchers:
• Direct Impacts count as 2 Hits
• Doesn't receive bonus activation progress against Constructs and Vehicles

Pellet Shotguns:
• Runs into network-related issues for triggering the perk and granting ammo on non-construct hits
• Only needs one pellet to hit per shot, they aren't considered separate Hits for the purpose of the perk
• Activation progress granted by each shot scales with distance: point-blank shots follow the standard formula but as few as 2 shots can trigger the perk on more distant targets
